website_summaries.verdict: These towels are extremely thick and luxurious, making them perfect for buffing.
pros: Sinland’s microfiber towels are made with 720gsm material, making them heavier, thicker, and more plush
This design is optimized for buffing, polishing, and removing wax
The amount of material also increases their absorbency, which is fantastic for drying wet surfaces
cons: These towels can produce lint and streaks in some cases

customer_reviews.title: Softest towels, like silk, and can be used for anything
customer_reviews.text: Hands down...the best towels ever made. Lol. I dont even continually buy them to use on my car. They are the softest most comfortable towel that I use for the gym, for hand towels when I need to dry my hands, or after I wash my face. I dont even care that the colors dont match everything in my house, I use it as my hand towel to dry my hands after I wash them at the kitchen sink. Get the yellow and grey ones. They are like silk and feel so soft to use for anything. And, they have a great absorption ability, which was really what they were designed for, while eliminating streaks after washing ur car.
customer_reviews.author: neil

customer_reviews.title: The thickness helps to wick away water from crevices, and gives it amazing moisture holding ability.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent thickness. The thickness helps to wick away water from crevices, and gives it amazing moisture holding ability. I can try the whole car without wringing it out. Spray lightly with water to pre-moisten for best effectiveness. This is just the right size. The similar but larger Woolly Mammoth is way too large. Two colors allows you to keep track of what you are using where. One color for upper areas of the car, other color for lower areas. Never use on paint if it has been used on wheels. Pressure wash after use if you can, then put it in the washer (with no other fabrics, just other microfiber) and use a citrus microfiber cleaner as detergent.
customer_reviews.author: KrisS

customer_reviews.title: Performance microfiber FIVE STARS PLUSH
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the towel because I am already an aficionado, and expected the brand to be a purchase to enjoy. I was right, this towel is PLUSH. Bringing so much glass mirrors into service where I live turns out to be WAY MORE the TIME SAVER, to have. I am not that easy to sell a microfiber, and I have purchased many others; this is the PLUSH you have been waiting for, and should BUY! Terrific performance.
customer_reviews.author: Jon S Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, super soft
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and seem like nice quality. I have really hard water, so it's a race to dry my car before the minerals start to spot the paint. These towels do a great job soaking up the water and don't leave streaking. Some say you can dry a car with one towel, do yourself a favor and buy two of the larger size. I have a mid to full sized sedan and I definetly need two towels to get a perfect dry. Overall a nice product, I wish I bought these years ago. I've always used plain 100% cotton towels, these perform much better.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Beer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Thirsty
customer_reviews.text: Towels are very soft, and absolutely no chance of scratching the finish. Very surprised how absorbant these towels are. I was able to completely dry two cars with one towel, without leaving any waterspots behind.
customer_reviews.author: John Bartolotta

customer_reviews.title: Not color fast.  Color will run so only wash with other dark colors
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the microfiber is OK. They are no color fast. The color runs on these. I washed them with white microfiber towels and the white towels are now blue. Be warned. The color running just makes me wonder about overall quality, but takes off polish fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: Schmalio

customer_reviews.title: The best stuff available.
customer_reviews.text: The maguires cleaning and polishing wax is the best around. I've tried it all.. Spray on, liquid, and hand carnival waxes, several brands. I haven't found anything that comes close to maguires in how the car looks, how well it really does help clean, and how well it protects the car's finish. It's simply the best stuff there is. The sinland microfiber cleaning towels are also tops. They are thick, heavy duty towels that are well made and very soft. These are easily the best car towels on the market.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: but the do work great. The material is the same as my old ...
customer_reviews.text: These are much smaller than I expected. The size is the reason for only 4 stars. I probably should have read the info closer. I have one that is several years old and it's 3 time the size of these. They are small, but the do work great. The material is the same as my old one and will hold lots of water while it shines my car at the same time. These would be great for inside the auto, working on smaller areas such as tires, mirrors etc. but I use mine on the entire auto.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: BEST MICROFIBER TOWELS EVER!
customer_reviews.text: These Microfiber Car Towels are ABSOLUTELY AMAZING!!!! They do not leave streak marks or lint when wiping down your car. I have a Range Rover Evoque and one of these towels sufficiently dries my car to PERFECTION! I am extremely picky about how my car looks and the fact these towels do such an AMAZING job makes me VERY HAPPY!
customer_reviews.author: Pam (Chicago)

customer_reviews.title: Very nice towel
customer_reviews.text: This towel is definitely a premium product. Double thick and sewn very well at the perimeter seam. It was so nice and soft I hesitated using it to dry the vehicles. When I finally did it worked better than any other I have used. I can dry an entire car (the SUV took a secondary towel to finish it off) with a single towel with no lint, etc. left behind. Would definitely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: JDC

customer_reviews.title: Best microfiber towel I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: The thickest most plush microfiber towels I’ve ever used to keep my car in tiptop shape. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Wonderboy

customer_reviews.title: LINT DISASTER
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed!! These leave lint everywhere! I washed in cool water and air dried and used one time to find out they leave lint behind. Yesterday, my return window closed.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie :o)

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, thick, durable cloths
customer_reviews.text: Ideal cloths for auto finish care. They are very thick and soft and are beautiful colors.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect towel for drying autos and glass
customer_reviews.text: Excellent drying towel. It is just the right size. Very soft and absorbs all the water leaving no spots on the car. This is the second one I have purchased. Make sure you wash it first (no fabric softener) to remove any lint.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Quite absorbant!
customer_reviews.text: This is quite absorbant. I don't even use it on my car but to dry out the shower door and wall to reduce mildew build up. It can hold a ton of water and just rotate them weekly with the wash. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice microfiber
customer_reviews.text: Very nice microfiber. Super soft and super absorbent. Nor do they scratch finishes. Purchased to polish off car wax and they do a great job.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These work great l use them mainly to dry my car after washing or sometimes to dust the outside, they are very soft and will not scratch your car , they wash well just don't drop it on the ground and then continue using it as it will pick up dirt and then cause scratching

customer_reviews.title: Great for Collector Cars, or Protecting Quality Auto Paint on Any Car
customer_reviews.text: Best ever used! Very soft & absorbent. Does not leave any tiny marks or damage your car's paint. If you hand wash your collector car, this is the best drying towel I have ever used. I have given them to other collector car owners as mini gifts. After they use them, they ask me where they can buy more.

customer_reviews.text: My husband had been hinting that he wanted some of these to use on the car, his golf cart, etc. So I ordered these and he was amazed at the quality of these clothes. Handy that they came 2 in a package--now he has one in his golf cart and another in the car. He wants me to order more!

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any true auto lover!
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend these for removing the wax. I haven't used them to dry yet, but I will. I saw the review where one came apart, just sew it up. My husband said these are by far the best towels we ever purchased for the cars. Very happy I listened the reviews that recommend these.

customer_reviews.title: These things are awesome! They're so plush it's like a really tiny ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome! They're so plush it's like a really tiny blanket, and my truck likes that! Seriously though, these are really nice MF towels, especially for the money, I definitely recommend them.

product_meta.title: SINLAND Microfiber Car Drying Towel,Super Absorbent car Cleaning Towel and Double-Faced Plush, Premium Professional Soft Microfiber Towel 16" x 16", 2 Pieces
feature_bullets: Incredible Grip to Remove Waxes More Easily, SINLAND Super Plush Buffing Towel Is Designed Specifically for Wax and Sealant Removal
Effective cleaning under wet and dry conditions,100 percent machine washable
Double Sides and 2 Layers Plush. Can Absorb Up to Almost 10 Times Their Weights In Liquid. Not Only Sucks Up Water Fast but Also Wrings Out Quickly and Easily
No Lint! No Streaks! No Swirls! No Spots! No Scratches!....Premium Quality Material and Reinforced Edges Make This Towel Strong and Long Lasting
Ultra Soft, Plush-Long Pile Non-Abrasive Microfiber Cloths Will Not Scratch Paints, Coats or Other Surfaces, Can Be Used for Cars, Mirrors, Tiles, Windows, etc
